vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness & Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Num.13.6;
son of: Jephunneh (H3312);
brother of: Kenaz (H7073I);
father of: Achsah (H5915), Iru (H5900), Elah (H0425J), Naam (H5277)
Group of ka.lev (כָּלֵב "Caleb" H3612)
§ Calebite = see Caleb "dog"
a descendant of Caleb
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦勒人 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 見迦勒 [3612] "狗"
迦勒的後裔 (撒上 25:3)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
迦勒人 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 见迦勒 [3612] "狗"
迦勒的后裔 (撒上 25:3)
